description:
http://anidb.net/ch2734 [Sumimura Yoshimori] is a normal 14-year-old middle-school student, though he always falls asleep in class. This is however due to his night duties, in which he takes on the role of a Kekkaishi (Barrier Master).
Together with http://anidb.net/ch2741 [Yukimura Tokine], his neighbour and childhood friend (/sweetheart), he serves as a protector for the school which holds a few ancient secrets. These secrets are slowly being unraveled, which may play a role in Yoshimori`s ultimate plans.

REGULAR.description:
Yoshimori Sumimura is a kekkaishi and reluctant heir to his family. Together with his neighbor Tokine Yukimura, he is responsible for defending their school, Karasumori Academy, from demons.
Source: crunchyroll

The events are shown of what Yoshimori and Tokine do on a typical day, showing Yoshimori is a slacker who sleeps through class, while Tokine is a smart and popular student. The personal lives of the two main characters are delved into a little more as well showing their relationships with their close family. Yoshimori obsesses with making pastries, specifically chocolate castle cakes. When Yoshimori and Yokine track down a frog ayakashi called Tsuchigama at night, Yoshimori wears sneakers to protect Yokine from its attacks. Yoshimori is left to restore the school grounds as he heals his wounds, by the use of his shikigami (paper dolls).

Yomi Kasuga, a demon tamer sent by the Urakai, arrives in town to stay at the Yukimura residence.
Source: crunchyroll

Yomi first receivesYoki as her demon. Yoshimori, finding himself inside Yoki, manages to break through the shelled back of the demon.
Source: crunchyroll

Shigemori explains to Yoshimori that within the Urakai is a group of demon tamers called the Yagyou who are an operations squad of the Urakai, and that the leader of the Yagyou is…
Source: crunchyroll

Because of the power of the Karasumori site, a huge cherry blossom grows in front of the school completely out of season, attracting curious students.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori meets with Yumeko Hananokoji to see the owner of a bakery, whom Masahiro had apprenticed for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Best Cake in the World

REGULAR.description:
Yoshimori tries to improving during his training sessions, to which Shigemori notices how much power he has gained.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Day in the Life of Yoshimori

REGULAR.description:
A handsome teacher named Tatsumi Mino shows up secretly attacking a female student.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori as a cake lover is obsessed with the legendary chocolate cake, mentioned by his father Shuji Sumimura, that will be secretly offered early every morning to a limited number of people at a bakery.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori encounters and captures three minor ayakashi. Honetaro, Uhosuke, and Nagao. However, their leader a demon dog named Koya arrives.
Source: crunchyroll

Madarao is now weakened from his battle with Koya, who seems to still gain more power even after being poisoned.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori, thinking about being the legitimate successor, becomes upset when he is unable to read the family scrolls, confused as to why his older brother was not better suited as the heir.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Masamori Sumimura: Chief of the Night Troops

REGULAR.description:
Yoshimori recalls of how Tokine paid more attention to Masamori in their childhood together.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori continues to begrudge his older brother, due to his advanced techniques.
Source: crunchyroll

A strange creature shows up at school in broad daylight, discreetly stealing food from many students and leaving behind moss.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lord Uro of the Colorless Marsh

REGULAR.description:
It is revealed that Shigemori had stay behind when Tokiko had been sent to fix the bed of Lord Oro about a half century ago.
Source: crunchyroll

A typical day for Toshimori Sumimura, Yoshimori`s youngest brother, starts as he heads off to school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Day in the Life of Toshimori

REGULAR.description:
Yoshimori, thinking back about the bed of Lord Uro, goes to his grandfather concerning the power of barriers, though he intends to use this power to put a seal on the site.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori creates a barrier surrounding Shirahago, however he is unable to stabilize it.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori and Tokine warns Mino keep a lookout for any ayakashi disguised as a human. After hearing about a new transfer student, Yurina becomes suspicious.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gen Shishio: The Heartless Transfer Student
非情な転校生 志々尾限

REGULAR.description:
Yoshimori and Tokine find out that Gen is a member of the Yagyou dispatched by Masamori to help protect the site. Gen pays a visit to Shuji in order to talk to Shigemori.
Source: crunchyroll

Kyoichi Hiba, another member of the Yagyou, comes to check up on Gen. Inside the school, Yoshimori comes across a wheeling ayakasha named Ohkubiguruma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In Pursuit of the Legitimate Heir

REGULAR.description:
Yurina, along with Kyoko and Ayano, discover that her friend Aoi has developed a crush on Gen.
Source: crunchyroll

Kimiya Hachioji, a famous male student, approaches Tokine at school, attracting a crowd of many schoolgirls. What could he be up to?
Source: crunchyroll

While Tokine and Gen are busy fighting off an ayakashi, a desperate Yoshimori finds another ayakashi, capturing and destroying it.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori and Yurina become aware of a black ghost cat on the shoulder of Kurosu, their literature teacher.
Source: crunchyroll

Aihi develops a durable edition of the human skin suit for four recruited ayakashi to wear.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori launches Tokine into the sky for her to cast barriers around the four human ayakashi, but the arthropodan Haizen manages to free the others by melting the barriers.
Source: crunchyroll

Gen thinks back to when Masamori had first assigned him to help protect the site, knowing that it would have been a risk on his life.
Source: crunchyroll

Gen had been born as a half ayakashi, and his older sister Ryo Shishio was the only person he had trusted as a child, since he had been bullied by a boy named Tsutomu.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori pays a visit to Gen for lunch. Soon after, Tokine comes by with Atora Hanashima, a member of the Yagyou as a monster tamer, let alone being Gen`s personal trainer.
Source: crunchyroll

Shigemori is verified by Matsudo of the location of the Kokuboro headquarters. At night Tokine and Gen are busy fighting ayakashi, and Yoshmori begins to suspect the purpose for the establishment of the Kokuboro.
Source: crunchyroll

Aihi is told by Byaku to find a way to prolong Princess`s life. She is then asked by Kaguro about her guise as a human, as she explains it is habitual since she had been forced and confined by a master to remain as a human, as she studying their way of life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamago kara Koe: Yami no Sasoi
卵から声 闇の誘い

REGULAR.description:
Yoshimori, after having seen Gen`s encounter with Kaguro, tells Tokine about this. Meanwhile, the purple egg continues to confuse Gen into joining the Kokuboro.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori, Tokine, and Gen continue to take out the army of ayakashi, with Byaku and Shion monitoring this.
Source: crunchyroll

Gagin is preparing to launch a giant flame ball at Yoshimori, Tokine, and Gen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shishio Gen no Saigo no Tatakai

REGULAR.description:
Sakon, a lizard ayakashi, who is a subordinate of Gagin, requests that Byaku should allow him to take over leadership for the first task force.
Source: crunchyroll

Hekian, a cloaked ayakashi plans to draw out the former deity of the Karasumori site, who is Lord Uro, by using his thousand eyes ability.
Source: crunchyroll

Tokiko has finally returned, just to announce to Tokine that she will be leaving again two days later.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori, taking Tokine`s words decides to put aside everything to be able to train.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori and Tokine feels quite crowded when the Yagyou move into the neighborhood.
Source: crunchyroll

Yoshimori leads Sen, along with his friends Shu Akitsu and Dai Yaegashi, into a forest where he engages a friendly battle with them.
Source: crunchyroll

The kekkaishi and the Yagyou easily fend off a horde of ayakashi. Yoshimori, still having his mind set on avenging Gen, leaves the battlefield in search of Kaguro.
Source: crunchyroll

Tokine manages to infiltrate Kurosusuki by following Shion. Masamori frees Atora and destroys Sakon in his true form with ease.
Source: crunchyroll

Tokine gets through the main entrance of the castle, destroys Koshu in his true form, and continues her search for Yoshimori.
Source: crunchyroll

Matsudo soon corners Byaku, revealed to be nine years older than him. Fifty years ago, he had found out that Byaku had been performing experiments on his wife Risa Kagami.
Source: crunchyroll

As the castle begins to fall apart, the Yagyou heads into Kurosusuki along the passageway created by Tokiko.
Source: crunchyroll

Aihi rescues Tokine, who was about to fall into the depths of the castle.
Source: crunchyroll

Tokine is finally reunited with Yoshimori in Kurosusuki, but without any time to waste, Yoshimori immediately goes into battle to settle his revenge with Kaguro.
Source: crunchyroll

Kaguro says that one must cut ties with humankind in order to become stronger. Tokine and Sen appear to show how Kaguro`s blades could penetrate the barriers.
Source: crunchyroll

Running out of time, Tokine rashly decides to jump straight into the true barrier of Yoshimori, effectively managing to reawaken him from his trance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 店頭プロモーション用トレーラー映像
ผู้ผนึกมาร
